Luxury Appliance Repair by ZARICCI

At Luxury Appliance Repair, we specialize in repairing high-end appliances with precision, ensuring your kitchen and home run seamlessly. With certified technicians, premium-quality parts, and exceptional customer care, we deliver reliable service tailored to your needs.

We’re trusted by customers throughout Los Angeles to repair luxury and high-end brands like Viking, Wolf, Thermador, Gaggenau, Miele, Bosch, Jenn-Air, KitchenAid, Dacor, La Cornue, Smeg, Big Chill, Elmira Stove Works, BlueStar, Fisher & Paykel, and AGA.

Services

We repair Sub-zero refrigerators, freezers, wine coolers, warming drawers

Experience the Difference in Premium Appliance Repair

  • Skilled Technicians: Our team is highly trained in the latest techniques for high-end appliance service, guaranteeing fast and precise repairs.
  • Genuine Parts: We use only manufacturer-approved components for Sub-Zero repair, Viking repair, Wolf repair, Thermador repair, and beyond, ensuring quality you can trust.
  • Prompt Response: We understand breakdowns can disrupt your routine. That’s why we offer same-day service for most luxury appliance repairs, getting you back on track in no time.
  • Transparent Pricing: No hidden fees or surprise costs—just honest quotes tailored to your specific repair needs.
  • Satisfaction Guarantee: Our work is backed by a comprehensive warranty, reinforcing our dedication to top-quality premium appliance repair.

We Service Leading Luxury Brands

From Miele and Gaggenau to La Cornue, our seasoned technicians have the know-how to diagnose and fix any issue. Whether it’s a Sub-Zero refrigerator repair or a Thermador oven malfunction, count on us to restore your appliance’s performance—and your peace of mind.

Why We’re the Best Choice for High-End Appliance Service

  • Years of Experience: Our background in luxury appliance repair spans all major upscale brands.
  • Customer-Focused Approach: You’ll receive personalized attention throughout the entire repair process.
  • Upfront Communication: We keep you informed at every step, from initial diagnosis to final inspection.
  • Convenient Scheduling: Book your repair when it suits you best—our team is here to accommodate your busy lifestyle.

Ready to Restore Your Luxury Appliances?

Don’t let a faulty premium appliance disrupt your daily life. Trust our certified professionals to deliver reliable repairs with unmatched expertise.

Call us today to schedule a service or book online now to experience the top-tier support you and your high-end appliances deserve!
